page.title: 04BUCKSBURN POLICE STATION
page.content: A group of people went down to the police station and asked a policeman a few questions: 1: What's your most common crime? Answer: Vandalism. 2: How many policemen are normally on duty?. Answer: 40. 3: How tall have you got to be to get into the force? Answer: Men:5 foot 9 inches. Women:5 foot 8 inches. 4: What weapons are used by the policemen?. Answer: Truncheons. 5: What do the dogs do? Answer: Sniff out bombs, drugs, etc. 6: Have there been any policemen killed? Answer: Yes, about two.
